promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, short, single-word pokemon name for a chibi young simple serpent dark-type with regal scales. It can be found in crypt-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon or dark:
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Regalfang, a chibi young simple serpent dark-type pokemon. It can be found in crypt-like environments It has the following abilities: bite. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the word serpent or dark or the ability names. Use a maximum of 50 characters:
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of dark-type pokemon, serpent-like, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, dark galaxy background
generatedDescription: Regalfang skulks in crypts, seeking soft prey. A chibi mischievous menace, looms with a sinister bite.
